doc.field: Series IX: General Theater Related Material
Series IX: General Theater Related Material
Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers
Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers

Sherman, Stuart. Includes materials related to "2nd Spectacle" at Theater for the New City, "4th Spectacle" at Theater for the New City, "5th Spectacle with Jaime Davidovich" at 3 Mercer St. Store, "6th Spectacle" at Collective for living Cinema, "8th Spectacle" at Theater for the New City in 1979, "10th Spectacle" at The Kitchen, " 11th Spectacle (The Erotic)" at 56 Lispenard in 1979, "11th Spectacle" at Artists Space, "Eleven Films and the 11th Spectacle" at Bleeker St. Cinema 1980, "Seventeenth Spectacle (Yes and Noh) at St. Mark's Church, "3=11 (A careful misreading)", "Stuart Sherman Spectacle Actions and Objects (Constructions and Portraits)" in French 1977. Folder also includes some press reviews.
